item.title: What am I doing?
item.description: I’ve started writing this a couple of times, and I’ve started over a couple of times

item.title: Adventures in websiting

item.title: About Me
item.description: If you’ve landed here, then you’ve probably got a rough idea of who I am. Sometime in the future, I’d plan to use this site a bit more generally, but for now it’ll mostly be focused on the bike trip.
